item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, February 11, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump to halt enforcement of law banning bribery of foreign officials
2. Elon Musk-led consortium offers $100bn to take control of OpenAI
3. Billionaire’s daughter can hand back £33mn moth-infested mansion, court rules
4. UK inflation threat receding, says BoE rate-setter who voted for big cut
5. Trump warns ‘all’ Israeli hostages must be released by Saturday
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, February 11, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
